data.text: Guye loo ɠundiɠii nɔnɔi ʋe. Davide ná-guyei.
Ee, Ɠɔoɠɔ GALAGI, ɗa ɠa gè lɔɔɠuzu è ʋoluʋɛ,
Woilo gòoi ma, zuvilɛ è ùnmɔɔ!
Mazɔlɔɔ ɗa ɠa è ga nà-fasai, ta nà-siɠigi,
Ɗa kùla tumɔi zu, nii ti seiɗai tùɠɔ,
Nà zɛ̀nvui ɠalivaazu è ma,
Gè naati wɔinzeɠea, niiti ti ɠilizu zɛɛ zaleiti ba.
Nà ɠɛ wuulee ga koozunɛɛi, ɗa-wooɠɛɠiladai maaʋele ma,
È la dɔ̀ɔzu sìli nuiti zeezu,
Màawɔinɠa Ɠɔoɠɔ GALAGI!
Nà-eteai ɓega taɓai zu,
Wɔ̀inzeɠe nuiti kpein ta ɲɛɛɠulazu sù,
Nà-fai yeema nuiti bɛ ti-yiimaʋɛ, eɠɛ nà za.
Nà naama woo ɲɔiti mɛnisu, niiti ti wosu dàalɔɠɔma:
Kɛlɛ nɔ̀un nà, nà ɠalivaazu è ma, ee, Ɠɔoɠɔ GALAGI!
Nà-eteai ɠa è yeezu,
Yeezei bù ga pagɔ, nà ga ɗa-wotiɠɛ nui!
Ee, Ɠɔoɠɔ GALAGI, gè mina lɔ unfegi zu,
Ti ɠɛ ga ɓoɓoiti,
Ɗa-nuɓɔɠɔlai wɔɔlɔʋɛ gola,
Ɗa ti lɔɔɠuzu è-ɠaazu ma,
Mamagi ɠa Ɠɔoɠɔ GALAGI ʋɛ!
Kìgi zupuni, eyɛsu gè ɠɛ ma:
Wɔiti wo ga Ɠɔoɠɔ GALAGI ná-wooɠɛɠila nuiti, à nɛɛʋɛ wo pɛ!
À zɛbɛzeɠe, wo zulo,
